plot: In an eerie, almost familiar, world a sexually predatory man books a massage hoping he might get lucky - instead he is taken on a strange and trans formative journey by his masseuse - who may be a living incarnation of the Goddess Kali.
title: Lady of Sorrows
plot_es: In an eerie, almost familiar, world a sexually predatory man books a massage hoping he might get lucky - instead he is taken on a strange and trans formative journey by his masseuse - who may be a living incarnation of the Goddess Kali.
plot_en: In an eerie, almost familiar, world a sexually predatory man books a massage hoping he might get lucky - instead he is taken on a strange and trans formative journey by his masseuse - who may be a living incarnation of the Goddess Kali.
